video.title: Helix
video.synopsis: While investigating a possible outbreak at an Arctic research facility, scientists discover a new virus that could wipe out every human on the planet.

episodes.synopsis: CDC pathologist Alan Farragut leads his team to investigate a deadly retrovirus on a remote Arctic research base and uncovers a web of dark secrets.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: While Alan and the CDC team deal with the infected victims of Peter's attack, a rebellion is brewing at the Arctic Biosystems base.
episodes.title: Vector

episodes.synopsis: Just as the team thinks they have the virus contained, new information and deadly secrets thwart their progress, and Julia falls victim to the virus.
Desperation grows for Alan, who risks killing Peter to test a cure; meanwhile, the group of quarantined fight Dr. Hatake for control of their destiny.
episodes.title: Single Strand

episodes.synopsis: Peter clings to life and Alan tries to uncover what happened to Noreen, while Julia meets a surprising ally among the quarantined on Level R.
episodes.title: White Room

episodes.synopsis: Alan and Jordan make headway in decoding the virus and while Dr. Hatake works on curing Julia, his connection to Daniel is revealed.
episodes.title: Antiqatiga

episodes.synopsis: Ilaria's CEO and her team of mercenaries are determined to collect the virus, its cure and Julia; meanwhile, Daniel discovers his ties to Dr. Hatake.
episodes.title: Survivor Zero

episodes.synopsis: Julia is taken prisoner after Sutton's relationship to Dr. Hatake is revealed, while the vectors take Peter's body before Julia can destroy him.
episodes.title: Bloodline

episodes.synopsis: After discovering a "virus vault," Alan makes plans to destroy the core samples with Julia, who harbors a secret relationship to Dr. Hatake.
episodes.title: Level X

episodes.synopsis: Alan and Julia head for help and uncover Hatake's true reasons for creating the Narvik virus; meanwhile, Dr. Jordan may have a cure for cancer.
episodes.title: Fushigi

episodes.synopsis: While Sarah's tumor appears to respond to an injection of Julia's spinal fluid, the vectors set human traps, and Dr. Hatake prepares for an invasion.
episodes.title: Black Rain

episodes.synopsis: Alan and the other uninfected hide underground, while an Ilaria assassin forces Dr. Hatake to make a life-and-death decision about Julia and Daniel.
episodes.title: The Reaping

episodes.synopsis: Julia visits with her mother, Dr. Hatake reveals why he worked for Ilaria, and Alan's CDC team must now search the world for the stolen Narvik virus.
episodes.title: Dans L'Ombre

episodes.synopsis: When all but one of the passengers on The Mist of Avalon succumb to a deadly microbe, Peter, Sarah and Kyle explore a mysterious island to learn more.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: On the island, the inexplicable recovery of a sick child raises Sarah's suspicions. Caleb and Julia unearth secrets when they dig up Alan's grave.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Jordan and Peter leave safety behind as they venture into the woods to gather specimens. Sister Amy hatches a plan to get rid of them permanently.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: A worker develops the disease after being stung by a bee. Peter seeks help for dealing with Alan. In the future, Julia attempts a risky escape.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Peter exposes Alan's secret. Kyle meets with opposition when he attempts to quarantine the orchard and the infected hive.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: When the abbey is endangered by a new outbreak, the CDC team is forced to work together. In Paris, Julia searches for answers.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: The island becomes a hell on earth for Alan and Sarah. News about Brother Michael sends Julia to St. Germain.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: The Coast Guard arrives on the island with bad news for the CDC team. Sister Amy grapples with Brother Michael's intentions and plays her hand.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Julia and Sergio arrive at the abbey. Winger joins Alan and Kyle on a hunt in the woods for a possible antidote to the pathogen.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: As Kyle's illness worsens, the team races to find the Bleeding Tree. Sister Amy barters with Julia for immortality. Peter makes a shocking discovery.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: As Julia prepares to transplant the fetus from Jordan into Amy, a last-ditch plan ensures that the pathogen will never leave the island.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Alan and Julia search for the Mother Tree and try to foil a deadly plot. Kyle and Jordan try to escape from the island. Peter takes over the abbey.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Sarah tries to get the team and the cure off the island. Peter's interference with Alan's destructive plan brings their feud to an explosive climax.
episodes.title: Episode 13
